567610.name: Heroes of Havoc: Idle Adventures - Founder's Pack
567610.description:
With the full launch of our epic Idle RPG, Heroes of Havoc: Idle Adventures coming soon, players can get a head start in the battle with this exciting DLC pack. We've hand selected these highly desirable items -

  • Rare Hero - Lorcan the Werewolf
  • 800 Gems
  • Legacy leather helmet
  • 20,000 in-game Gold
  • Lifetime VIP Status

This DLC pack of goodies is worth $9.99 (SRP). However, players can pick it up as part of the game pre-launch for the discounted price of $5.99. That's a 40% discount. Bargain!
567610.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语, 韩语, 简体中文
